2063800.name: Dungems
2063800.description:
YOUR DUNGEON IS UNDER ATTACK!

A horde of heroes from a nearby castle is on their way to ransack your dungeon. Build traps and employ mobs to defend your treasure.



Dungems is a mix of tactics and tower defence. Invading heroes from nearby castles will try and outwit your dungeon designs - using spells, charms and shields to get around your obstacles...



Outwit the heroes to keep you treasure intact. Use the bones of fallen enemies to unlock tower packs and upgrades. Use these upgrades to take on even bigger hordes of heroes.



Create a perfect deck of monsters and mechanical traps - pick the right pieces to show your enemy you are the real boss.

LIFECYCLE
The game is a work in progress. Made with a lot of love and mistakes.

If you like (or dislike) the game - please leave us some feedback!
